titles.title: To provide a location in Arlington, Virginia, for construction of a memorial to honor the men and women who have served in the United States Air Force.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on National Security, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 10/12/1998--Introduced. Authorizes the Air Force Memorial Foundation to construct a memorial within the Arlington Naval Annex in Arlington, Virginia, to honor individuals who served in the U.S. Air Force and its predecessors. Requires the Secretary of Defense to provide a suitable memorial site and to reimburse the Foundation for expenses incurred. Provides that, upon commencement of memorial construction, no person may construct any monument, memorial, or other structure within a specified area of Arlington County, Virginia, which generally surrounds the Iwo Jima Memorial.
